headers.Access-Control-Expose-Headers: ETag, Link, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval

{"description": "this is a test.", "public": true, "files": {"random-fortune-4.txt": {"content": ""The lawgiver, of all beings, most owes the law allegiance.
 He of all men should behave as though the law compelled him.
 But it is the universal weakness of mankind that what we are
 given to administer we presently imagine we own."
		-- H. G. Wells
"}, "random-fortune-3.txt": {"content": "All wars are civil wars, because all men are brothers ... Each one owes
infinitely more to the human race than to the particular country in
which he was born.
		-- Francois Fenelon
"}, "random-fortune-2.txt": {"content": "I'm having BEAUTIFUL THOUGHTS about the INSIPID WIVES of smug and
wealthy CORPORATE LAWYERS ...
"}, "random-fortune-1.txt": {"content": "No one can guarantee the actions of another.
		-- Spock, "Day of the Dove", stardate unknown
"}}}
